Title: Handling It: Symbiotic Glowspore Grip
Description:
I know a crafter who could help temper Fyr'alath. Erden of Clan Shikaar is extremely resourceful. He's performed many experiments with various reagents throughout the Dragon Isles.

Hunters are only as good as their weapons. Erden is known for crafting exquisite weaponry with exotic materials. His expertise in various flora and fauna should prove quite informative.
ObjectivesText: Seek out Erden in the Ohn'ahran Plains.
ObjectivesCompletionText: Speak to Erden in the Ohn'ahran Plains.
